p: Subjects had received various upfront and relapse therapies, with 21 treated for refractory disease and 17 treated for relapsed disease. Within the relapse group, subjects had received a mean of 3.3 prior additional therapeutic regimens and experienced a mean of 1.7 prior complete remissions. The overall mean time from diagnosis to enrollment was 3.4 years; 3.9 years for relapsed subjects and 2.9 years for subjects with primary refractory disease.
